title: Collide: The Complete Series
description: All three parts of the bestselling COLLIDE erotic romance series in one volume. This is a standalone novel and does not contain any cliffhangers.  When one morning, Olivia collides with handsome, brooding Troy on the streets of Manhattan, spilling hot coffee over his Armani suit, she has no clue that a simple offer to make amends will lead to the most intense erotic experience of her life.  Contains steamy erotic romance scenes.  Fans of Deborah Bladon's Pulse series, or erotic romance stories from JS Cooper should enjoy COLLIDE.
author: Ella Adams
